h7901.definition: a primitive root; to lie down (for rest, sexual connection, decease or any other purpose); × at all, cast down, (lover-)lay (self) (down), (make to) lie (down, down to sleep, still with), lodge, ravish, take rest, sleep, stay.

h7902.definition: from {{h7901}}; a lying down (of dew, or for the sexual act); × carnally, copulation, × lay, seed.

h7904.definition: a primitive root; to roam (through lust); in the morning (by mistake for {{h7925}}).

h7905.definition: feminine of {{h7900}} in the sense of {{h7899}}; a dart (as pointed like a thorn); barbed iron.

h7906.definition: from an unused root apparently meaning to surmount; an observatory (with the article); Seku, a place in Palestine; Sechu.

h7907.definition: from the same as {{h7906}}; observant, i.e. (concretely) the mind; heart.

h7908.definition: infinitive of {{h7921}}; bereavement; loss of children, spoiling.

h7909.definition: or שַׁכֻּל; from {{h7921}}; bereaved; barren, bereaved (robbed) of children (whelps).

h7910.definition: or שִׁכֹּר; from {{h7937}}; intoxicated, as a state or a habit; drunk(-ard, -en, -en man).

h7911.definition: or שָׁכֵחַ; a primitive root; to mislay, i.e. to be oblivious of, from want of memory or attention; × at all, (cause to) forget.

h7912.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7911}} through the idea of disclosure of a covered or forgotten thing; to discover (literally or figuratively); find.

h7914.definition: feminine from the same as {{h7906}}; a conspicuous object; picture.

h7915.definition: intensive perhaps from the same as {{h7906}} in the sense of {{h7753}}; a knife (as pointed or edged); knife.

h7916.definition: from {{h7936}}; a man at wages	by the day or year; hired (man, servant), hireling.

h7917.definition: feminine of {{h7916}}; a hiring; that is hired.

h7918.definition: a primitive root; to weave (i.e. lay) a trap; figuratively, (through the idea of secreting) to allay (passions; physically, abate a flood); appease, assuage, make to cease, pacify, set.

h7919.definition: a primitive root; to be (causatively, make or act) circumspect and hence, intelligent; consider, expert, instruct, prosper, (deal) prudent(-ly), (give) skill(-ful), have good success, teach, (have, make to) understand(-ing), wisdom, (be, behave self, consider, make) wise(-ly), guide wittingly.

h7921.definition: a primitive root; properly, to miscarry, i.e. suffer abortion; by analogy, to bereave (literally or figuratively); bereave (of children), barren, cast calf (fruit, young), be (make) childless, deprive, destroy, × expect, lose children, miscarry, rob of children, spoil.

h7922.definition: or שֵׂכֶל; from {{h7919}}; intelligence; by implication, success; discretion, knowledge, policy, prudence, sense, understanding, wisdom, wise.

h7923.definition: plural from {{h7921}}; childlessness (by continued bereavements); to have after loss of others.

h7925.definition: a primitive root; properly, to incline (the shoulder to a burden); but used only as denominative from {{h7926}}; literally, to load up (on the back of man or beast), i.e. to start early in the morning; (arise, be up, get (oneself) up, rise up) early (betimes), morning.

h7926.definition: from {{h7925}}; the neck (between the shoulders) as the place of burdens; figuratively, the spur of a hill; back, × consent, portion, shoulder.

h7927.definition: the same as {{h7926}}; ridge; Shekem, a place in Palestine; Shechem.

h7928.definition: for {{h7926}}; Shekem, the name of a Hivite and two Israelites; Shechem.

h7929.definition: feminine of {{h7926}}; the shoulderbone; shoulder blade.

h7930.definition: patronymic from {{h7928}}; a Shikmite (collectively), or descendants of Shekem; Shichemites.

h7931.definition: a primitive root (apparently akin (by transmission) to {{h7901}} through the idea of lodging; compare {{h5531}}, {{h7925}}); to reside or permanently stay (literally or figuratively); abide, continue, (cause to, make to) dwell(-er), have habitation, inhabit, lay, place, (cause to) remain, rest, set (up).

h7932.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7931}}; cause to dwell, have habitation.

h7934.definition: from {{h7931}}; a resident; by extension, a fellow-citizen; inhabitant, neighbour, nigh.

h7935.definition: or (prolonged) שְׁכַנְיָהוּ; from {{h7931}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has dwelt; Shekanjah, the name of nine Israelites; Shecaniah, Shechaniah.

h7936.definition: or (by permutation) סָכַר; (Ezra 4:5), a primitive root (apparently akin (by prosthesis) to {{h3739}} through the idea of temporary purchase; compare {{h7937}}); to hire; earn wages, hire (out self), reward, × surely.

h7937.definition: a primitive root; to become tipsy; in a qualified sense, to satiate with a stimulating drink or (figuratively) influence; (be filled with) drink (abundantly), (be, make) drunk(-en), be merry. (Superlative of {{h8248}}.)

h7939.definition: from {{h7936}}; payment of contract; concretely, salary, fare, maintenance; by implication, compensation, benefit; hire, price, reward(-ed), wages, worth.

h7940.definition: the same as {{h7939}}; recompense; Sakar, the name of two Israelites; Sacar.

h7941.definition: from {{h7937}}; an intoxicant, i.e. intensely alcoholic liquor; strong drink,   drunkard, strong wine.

h7942.definition: for {{h7943}}; drunkenness, Shikkeron, a place in Palestine; Shicron.

h7944.definition: from {{h7952}} abbreviated form; a fault; error.

h7945.definition: for the rel. {{h834}}; used with prepositional prefix, and often followed by some pronominal affix; on account of, whatsoever, whichsoever; cause, sake.

h7947.definition: a primitive root; to space off; intensive (evenly) to make equi-distant; equally distant, set in order.

h7948.definition: from {{h7947}}; a spacer or raised interval, i.e. the stile in a frame or panel; ledge.

h7949.definition: a primitive root; properly, meaning to be white; used only as denominative from {{h7950}}; to be snow-white (with the linen clothing of the slain); be as snow.

h7950.definition: from {{h7949}}; snow (probably from its whiteness); snow(-y).

h7951.definition: or שָׁלַו; (Job 3:26), a primitive root; to be tranquil, i.e. secure or successful; be happy, prosper, be in safety.

h7952.definition: a primitive root (probably identical with {{h7953}} through the idea of educing); to mislead; deceive, be negligent.

h7953.definition: a primitive root (rather cognate (by contraction) to the base of {{h5394}}, {{h7997}} and their congeners through the idea of extracting); to draw out or off, i.e. remove (the soul by death); take away.

h7954.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7951}}; to be secure; at rest.

h7955.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to {{h7952}}; a wrong; thing amiss.

h7956.definition: the same as {{h7596}} (shortened); request; Shelah, the name of a postdiluvian patriarch and of an Israelite; Shelah.

h7957.definition: from the same as {{h3851}} with sibilant prefix; a flare of fire; (flaming) flame.

h7958.definition: or שְׂלָיו; by orthographical variation from {{h7951}} through the idea of sluggishness; the quail collectively (as slow in flight from its weight); quails.

h7960.definition: (Aramaic) or שָׁלוּת; (Aramaic), from the same as {{h7955}}; a fault; error, × fail, thing amiss.

h7961.definition: or שָׁלֵיו; feminine שְׁלֵוָה; from {{h7951}}; tranquil; (in a bad sense) careless; abstractly, security; (being) at ease, peaceable, (in) prosper(-ity), quiet(-ness), wealthy.

h7962.definition: from {{h7951}}; security (genuine or false); abundance, peace(-ably), prosperity, quietness.

h7963.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7962}}; safety; tranquillity. See also {{h7961}}.

h7964.definition: or שִׁלֻּחַ; from {{h7971}}; (only in plural) a dismissal, i.e. (of a wife) divorce (especially the document); also (of a daughter) dower; presents, have sent back.

h7965.definition: or שָׁלֹם; from {{h7999}}; safe, i.e. (figuratively) well, happy, friendly; also (abstractly) welfare, i.e. health, prosperity, peace; × do, familiar, × fare, favour,   friend, × great, (good) health, (× perfect, such as be at) peace(-able, -ably), prosper(-ity, -ous), rest, safe(-ty), salute, welfare, (× all is, be) well, × wholly.

h7966.definition: or שִׁלֻּם; from {{h7999}}; a requital, i.e. (secure) retribution, (venal) a fee; recompense, reward.

h7967.definition: or (shorter) שַׁלֻּם; the same as {{h7966}}; Shallum, the name of fourteen Israelites; Shallum.

h7968.definition: probably for {{h7967}}; Shallun, an Israelite; Shallum.

h7969.definition: or שָׁלֹשׁ; masculine שְׁלוֹשָׁה; or שְׁלֹשָׁה; a primitive number; three; occasionally (ordinal) third, or (multiple) thrice; fork,   often(-times), third, thir(-teen, -teenth), three,   thrice. Compare {{h7991}}.

h7970.definition: or שְׁלֹשִׁים; multiple of {{h7969}}; thirty; or (ordinal) thirtieth; thirty, thirtieth. Compare {{h7991}}.

h7971.definition: a primitive root; to send away, for, or out (in a great variety of applications); × any wise, appoint, bring (on the way), cast (away, out), conduct, × earnestly, forsake, give (up), grow long, lay, leave, let depart (down, go, loose), push away, put (away, forth, in, out), reach forth, send (away, forth, out), set, shoot (forth, out), sow, spread, stretch forth (out).

h7973.definition: from {{h7971}}; a missile of attack, i.e. spear; also (figuratively) a shoot of growth; i.e. branch; dart, plant, × put off, sword, weapon.

h7974.definition: the same as {{h7973}}; Shelach, a postdiluvian patriarch; Salah, Shelah. Compare {{h7975}}.

h7975.definition: or (in imitation of {{h7974}}) שֶׁלַח; (Nehemiah 3:15), from {{h7971}}; rill; Shiloach, a fountain of Jerusalem; Shiloah, Siloah.

h7977.definition: from {{h7973}}; missive, i.e. armed; Shilchi, an Israelite; Shilhi.

h7978.definition: plural of {{h7973}}; javelins or sprouts; Shilchim, a place in Palestine; Shilhim.

h7979.definition: from {{h7971}}; a table (as spread out); by implication, a meal; table.

h7980.definition: a primitive root; to dominate, i.e. govern; by implication, to permit; (bear, have) rule, have dominion, give (have) power.

h7981.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7980}}; have the mastery, have power, bear rule, be (make) ruler.

h7982.definition: from {{h7980}}; probably a shield (as controlling, i.e. protecting the person); shield.

h7984.definition: (Aramaic) or שִׁלְטֹןlemma שִׁלְטן missing vowel, corrected to שִׁלְטֹן; corresponding to {{h7983}}; ruler.

h7988.definition: feminine from {{h7953}}; a fetus or babe (as extruded in birth); young one.

h7989.definition: from {{h7980}}; potent; concretely, a prince or warrior; governor, mighty, that hath power, ruler.

h7990.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7989}}; mighty; abstractly, permission; concretely, a premier; captain, be lawful, rule(-r).

h7991.definition: or שָׁלוֹשׁ; (1 Chronicles 11:11; 1 Chronicles 12:18), or שָׁלֹשׁ; (2 Samuel 23:13), from {{h7969}}; a triple, i.e. (as a musical instrument) a triangle (or perhaps rather three-stringed lute); also (as an indefinite, great quantity) a three-fold measure (perhaps a treble ephah); also (as an officer) a general of the third rank (upward, i.e. the highest); captain, instrument of musick, (great) lord, (great) measure, prince, three (from the margin).

h7992.definition: ordinal from {{h7969}}; third; feminine a third (part); by extension, a third (day, year or time); specifically, a third-story cell); third (part, rank, time), three (years old).

h7993.definition: a primitive root; to throw out, down or away (literally or figuratively); adventure, cast (away, down, forth, off, out), hurl, pluck, throw.

h7994.definition: from {{h7993}}; bird of prey, usually thought to be the pelican (from casting itself into the sea); cormorant.

h7995.definition: from {{h7993}}; a felling (of trees); when cast.

h7996.definition: the same as {{h7995}}; Shalleketh, a gate in Jerusalem; Shalleketh.

h7997.definition: a primitive root; to drop or strip; by implication, to plunder; let fall, make self a prey, × of purpose, (make a, (take)) spoil.

h7999.definition: a primitive root; to be safe (in mind, body or estate); figuratively, to be (causatively, make) completed; by implication, to be friendly; by extension, to reciprocate (in various applications); make amends, (make an) end, finish, full, give again, make good, (re-) pay (again), (make) (to) (be at) peace(-able), that is perfect, perform, (make) prosper(-ous), recompense, render, requite, make restitution, restore, reward, × surely.

h8000.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7999}}; to complete, to restore; deliver, finish.
